div.p:
DEVOTIONS, Viz.
1 A Good Womans
2 The humble Mans PRAYER.

l.hi: Precepts in Gods moſt holy Law

div.p: LONDON, Printed by T.M. for Abel Roper, at the ſigne of the Sun in Fleet-ſtreet. 1655.

div.head: To the Right Honourable, THE Lady ANNE PIERPOINT Elder Daughter To the Lord Marquiſſe of DORCHESTER.
div.p:
THough your Ladiſhip be already in the high road of Piety and Vertue, ſo that none need to ſhew you the way; yet theſe following Examples of the beſt of Women, and drawne out of the beſt
Records, will not, I preſume, prove altogether ſuperfluous; for they may confirm and encourage You in the ſame road: But hee who would counſel your Ladiſhip hereunto, muſt needs commend when hee counſelleth, and by his Exhortations, approve of your actions; ſo I reſt,

l.hi: REfreſh me Lord in this Worlds Wilderneſſe,
And with a cloud of witneſſes me lead,
Like fiery Pillars light to holyneſſe:
Be theſe divine examples that I read;
And grant that I may practiſe them in word and deed.

p.hi: Reverence To Rulers, and to Parents,
blesſing, ſight of days, both long &
good By theſe Contents the Text is underſtood.

lg.l: GRant me the gracious 3 Knowledg of the Queen
Of 1 Ki. 10.1 Sheba, that I may employ the ſame,
As was Act. 18.26 Priſcillas on Apollos ſeen,
As 2 Tim. 1.5 and 3.15 Eunice, Pro. 31.1 Bethſheba, Lois, and the Dame
St. John for childrens government 2 John. 4 Elect doth name.
The needful 1 Wiſdome into me infuſe
Of 2 Sa. 14.2 Theco'as woman, Eſt. 6.13 Zerech, 1 Sa. 25.3 Abigael,
And hers that made for 2 Sa. 20.16 Abels town a truce.
In part thy 4 Myſteries to me reveal
As with Act. 21.9 four Virgins, 2 Ki. 24.14 Hulda and Judg. 4.4 Debora thou didſt deal.
2 Sat. 21.10 Riſpa's 2 Repentance do in me beget,
Of Mar. 16.9 Mary Magdalene, and of the Luk. 7.38 Saint
That at the Phariſees houſe waſh't thy feet.
Me with the 8 Hope of Jud. 13.23 Manoahs Wife acquaint,
And Ge. 30.24 Rachel's that in bearing Joſeph was not faint.
The 5 Faith of Heb 11.11 Sarah into me inſpire,
Heb. 11.31 Rahab and Exod. 2.2 et. 6.20 Jacabed, the Lu. 1.45 Mother-Maid,
Joh. 11.22 et. 27 Martha's: Mat. 15 28 Hers that did only crums deſire,
Of Mat. 9.22 Her that had the bloody iſſue ſtaid,
And Joh. 4.27 Hers that at the Well for living water praid.
Breath into me to true Religion 6 Love,
As was in Gen. 31.19 Rachel, Ruth. 1.10 and 2.12 Ruth, and 1 Sa. 4, 21 Phinees Bride;
Unto thy Word my due 7 Attention move,
As thou didſt Ac. 16.14 Lydiu's by the river ſide,
And Luk 10.41 Mary's, whoſe good choice and part was not deny'd.
Make me 9 Obey thy will with all ſubmiſſion,
Like 1 Ki. 17.15 Ely's Hoſteſſe, and in me create
Ge. 13 17 Leah's and 1 Sa. 1.15 Hannah's ſpirit of 11 Petition;
With Ex. 15.26 Miriam let me thy 10 Praiſe relate,
And Luk. 2.36 Anna, that liv'd four ſcore yeers without a mate.
O grant that I the Church may ſtand in ſtead
By Jud. 2.25 Rahab's, Gen. 18.6 Sarah's 13 Hoſpitalitie,
Or 2 Sa. 17.19 Hers that ore the Wel ground corn did ſpread,
Or 2 Ki. 4.10 Hers that lodgd Eliſha carefully,
Or Ro. 16.2 Phebe's, Luk. 10.14 Martha's, Mary's liberalitie.
Thy Ex. 35.25 Tabernacle (Lord) let me adorn
With 12 Gifts, as Luke. 8.3 Suſan and great Chuſa's Wife,
The Mar. 12.42 Widow, whoſe two mites thou didſt not ſcorn,
And Act. 9.36 Dorcas that in all good works was rife,
And 2 King. 11.3. She that Joaſh gave his firſt ſeven yeers of life.
My ſpirituall 14 Labors (Lord) grant the ſucceſſe
Of Rom. 16 7. and 12 Junia, Perſis, Triphoſe, and Triphene,
That thy elected Veſſels me may bleſſe;
Grant that my bodily dangers may be ſeen,
As Exo. 1.17 Egypts Midwives, Jud. 4.21 Jahel great, Eſt. 4.16 Aſhuerus Queen.
Towards my Husband ſettle thou my 16 Minde,
As was Gen. 24 65. Rebecca's, modeſt, reverent,
Loving as Ge. 31.16 Rachel, Joſ. 15.18 Achſah, and as kind
As 1 Sam. 25 19. Michal, 1 Kin. 1.4 Abiſhag, and Pſ. 45.10 She that went
From Pharaohs royal Court, to live in Solomons tent.
As Ge. 29.25 Leah 22 Silent, and as 15 Patient
As churliſh Nabals underſtanding 1 Sa. 25.26 Wife;
And as the 2 Ki. 4.22 Shunamite obedient;
Unto my 17 Parents, to appeaſe all ſtrife,
Like Iud. 11.36 Jephta's virgin-Daughter may I yeeld my life.
As in Ge. 35.8 Rebecca's nurſe, ſo in me frame
A nurſe-like 18 minde towards my children deer,
As Exo. 2.5 Hers that Moſes rear'd: Elimelechs Rut. 4.16 Dame,
Diſcreet as Iſaacks Ge. 25.28 et 24.19 Wife let me appear,
Whoſe pains with Rut. 2.16 gleaning Ruth, give me the grace to bear.
Indue me with the 19 Courage to maintain
With Sarah wicked ſervants to conſtrain
T' amend, or elſe out of mine Ge. 21.10 houſe to weed
Profane, proud Hagar, with her ſcoffing Saracens ſeed
Grant me Luk. 1.6 Elizabeths 20 unreproved Life,
The ſeaſon'd 21 Speech of 2 Kin. 5.3 Naamans wife & maid
Gen. 3.10 and 4.25 Eve's 22 Happineſſe; who for loſt Abels life
Was with the birth of Holy Seth repaid,
My 24 dayes like Ge. 23.1 Sarahs! worth the numbring may be ſaid.
Apochriphal are the Stories, not the Life
Of Valiant Judith and Suſanna chaſt;
2 Mac. 7.1 Mother of martyrs ſeaven, young Tobi's wife.
Two 2 Macca. 6.10 women with their babes down head-long caſt
God make me not the leaſt, although of theſe the laſt.
But ſince theſe ſtarrs have had their ſlower motions
Preſerve me, from their errours and commotions.

p.hi: Luſt, from theſe good Lord deliver me.

lg.l: KEep me that I like Gen. 3.6 2 Cor. 11.3 Eve do not 1 entice
Nor be entiſ'd. Me from her 2 Errors gard
That did Job as an hypocrite deſpiſe,
Judging his Job. 2.9 miſery his juſt reward.
And Ge. 18.12 Sarahs that with laughter did thy word regard.
Means 3 indirect permit me not to uſe,
Good either to my ſelf for to attain,
As Ge. 29.23 and 38.14 Leah, Thamar did for Iſſues chuſe,
Or as Ge. 27.13 Rebecca did; for others gain,
Joſhu. 2.5 Rahab, and 2 Sa. 17.19 ſhe that in the Wel did Spies maintain
Rachol's Gen. 30.1 impatience at thy providence.
And Num. 12.1 Miriam's 10 Envie (Lord) in me reſtrain,
Phil. 4.2 Evodias and Syntiches 9 Difference,
1 Sa. 18.6 Their 5 Babling that Sauls envious wrath did gain
When in then Song they ſang, David's ten thouſand ſlain.
With Ex. 4.25 Zipporah, O let me not deſpiſe
Religion's wholſome juſt ſeveritie,
Ge. 35.22 Bilhah's 4 ſemptation free me from, and 2 Sa. 11.3 She
That left Ʋria's houſe, in Davids Court to be.
Me by the ſight of braſen Serpents heal,
From ſtinging Nu. 21.6 Serpents firy 'xamples keep,
And from 1 Sa. 28.7 her 11 Witcheraft that ra •• d Samuel:

From Jeſabels 2 Ki. 9. ••
firſt and Apo, 2.22 ſecond, with whom ſleep
Full many Prindes of the earth in darkneſs deep
The 8 Worldly hope put from me of Ge. 19.16 Lots Wife,
Of Jud. 5.28 Siſera's mother, Ru • h. 1.14 Orpah's faign'd pretence,
Gen. 4.23 Lamech and Ge. 26.35 Eſau's Wives 13 Contentious life,
Gen. 27.9 Hagars, 1 Sam. 1.6 Peninnah's ſpirits 15 virulence,
And curſed Micha's Mothers 12 curſing violence.Jud. 17.2
Me from the 14 Wandring Gen. 34.1 Dina's humour ſhield,
Lots Ge. 19.32 et. 39.32. daughters 20 Luſt, & Pharaohs Stewards Wife,
Nu. 25.1 15. Women of Moab, Cozbi by Phineehs kill'd;
The Levites Iud. 19.2 Leman that did cauſe ſuch ſtrife,
And 2 Ki. 9.22 Hers by Jehu puniſhed with loſſe of life.
Keep me from 1 Ki. 9.22 Athalia's 17 Cruelty,
And 2 Ki. 11.1 Hers that would have had the child divided;
Mar. 6.24 Herodias and her daughters melodie;
From Eſt. 1.12 Vaſhties 16 ſtoutneſſe, and theirs that provided
To make their Iud. 14.16 Husbands mighty Samſons ſtrength derided.
Lord free me from Acts. 5.8 Sapphira's ſpiritual 18 Lie,
From 1 Ki. 11.4 Solomons idolatrous gloſing Wives. Loves;
And from 1 Ki. 15.3 Maacah's baſe 19 Idolatrie,
Depos'd by Aſa for her Idol Groves;
And thoſe Ezek. 8.14 Shee-Tammuz Prieſts Ezekiel reproves.
The ſmalleſt grain of Vertue of the beſt
Plant in my heart; And frame in me a minde
Alwayes to make a conſcience of the leaſt
Infirmitie which in the weak I finde,
And from preſumptuous ſins let me be quite confind.

div.head: The Humble Mans Prayer. PART. II.

l.hi: GOd, Second Perſon in the Trinitie,
Who in the daies of thy humilitie
Didst here converſe below in mean eſtate;
Make me to ſhun theſe ſins, and thee to imitate.

p.hi: Prophets and his prophecies miſpriſing; Inward and outward
Pride of lifs enticing, Setting my heart on
Advancement, that may hinder my devotions,

lg.l: O Lord the God of Love, which doſt not love
Self-love 1, where by man doth himſelf miſpriſe,
Created in thine image from above;
Humble me, leſt I ſeek to equallize
Thy Natures 2 Dignity, as Judt. 6. Angels did deviſe.
Or like Dan. 3.7 Nebuchadnezzar, for to gain
The 3 Worſhip that to thee is only due,
As Heſt. 3.2 Haman and Dan. 6.7 Darius, Act. 12.13 Herods train;
Or of thy mighty 4 Power to make falſe ſhew,
As 2 Tim. 3.8 James, Jambres, Eſa. 14.14 Belſhazzer and Act. 8.10 Magus crew.
Inſpire me, leſt thy 5 Juſtice I deſpiſe
As King 2 Ki. 6.33 Jehoram, 1 Ki. 13.2 Jeroboam durſt;
Gen. 4.24 Lamech, 2 K. 19.12 Sennacherib: Or thy 6 Promiſe,
As Ge. 25.33 Eſau, and young Gen. 21.9 Iſhmael accurſt;
Or 2 Kin. 7.2 Prince which in Samarias gate with preſſe was burſt.
Leſt thy 7 Commandement I diſobey,
Like Gen. 11.4 Nimrod, Gen. 38.9 Onan, Exod. 5.7 Pharoh, bloody Ge. 46.8 Cain;
Or due and juſt 8 Reproofs do caſt away,
As 2 Sam. 3.7 Abner when he had with Riſpa lain,
The Lu. 16.14 Phariſees, and Ioh. 12.5 Judas that hath Chriſt betrain.
Neither thy 9 Prophets ſlightly entertain,
As men of th' old Ma. 24.38 World drowned in the flood;
Gen. 9.22 Cham, 1 Ki. 22.26 Ahab, Matth. 27 46. Phariſes, two 2 Kin. 1.9 Captains ſlain,
With the devoured Bethels 2 Ki. 2.23 mocking brood,
King Amo. 7.10 Amaziah, Lu. 23.11 Herod in his ſcoffing mood.
Turn me from Iob. 7.49 Phariſees inward 10 Pride of life,
Delighting in the ignorant peoples ſhame;
Or outward, as Iud. 1.7 Adonibezek's knife,
1 Sa. 13.22 Philiſtims, that made Iſraels weapons lame;

l.hi: Benhadad, 1 Sa. 11.2 Nahaſh, 2 Sa. 10.4 Hanu, 2 Ki. 8.1 • . et. 15.16 Azael, Menahame.

lg.l: With Iud. 12.4 &. 9.5. Ephramites, Abimelech, 2 Sa. 20.10 Joab, 1 Sa. 18.9 Saul,
Setting on 13 Pompous vanity my devotion,
As men of Eze. 6.49 Sodom, 2 Sam. 14 25 Abſolom, and all
The vain ſuperfluous pride in Heſt. 1.3 Ahaſhueros Hall
From motions all of Pride do thou me ſave,
Ev'n ſuch as thy deer children ſet on fire;
As Gen. 3 6 Adam 14 Knowledg only ſought to have,
Or Nu. 11.29 Joſhua, who for envie did thereof enquire.
Let no 15 Advancement (Lord) my heart lift up
As Mat. 20.21 James and John, ſtiled the Sons of Thunder,
Whoſe mother did deſire to keep th' Apoſtles under.
At which the Matth. 20 24 Ten were mov'd with 17 Indignation,
As ſons of Jacob, that their brother ſold,
Were mov'd Act. 7.9 with envie at his divination:
And Nu. 12.1 Aaron that with Moſes ſought to ſcold.
Me as I am, not worſe nor 16 better let men hold.
